summary: "Ant-Man" is a 2015 superhero movie about Scott Lang, a thief who becomes a hero using technology that lets him shrink in size. It's part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The film was directed by Peyton Reed and stars Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly, and Michael Douglas. Development started in 2006, with many changes in the creative team. The film was well-received for its humor, visual effects, and cast. It made over $519 million worldwide and led to two sequels.
title: Ant-Man (film)
